The pure class interface. 
public class ShuffleComp
  extends Shuffle
A shuffle which is the composition of two shuffles. If f : XY and f : YZ then f;g : XZ.

Author:
Alan Jeffrey
Version: v1.0 1998/06/03

                   Shuffle g);
